description:
Save up to 70% on looks for every room. 
Finds you’ll love. Exclusive prices. New sales daily at 11am ET.

Download our app and get on-the-go access to furniture and decor for every style. Our members enjoy: 
•	New sales daily—over 70 each week! 
•	Up to 70% off furniture, accents, organization, kitchenware, lighting, bedding, gifts, rugs, pillows & more
•	$15 credit when friends they invite make their first purchase

Featuring hand-picked products for just a limited time, sales are available to members only. Not a Joss & Main member yet? No problem! Membership is free and it’s easy to join—just enter your email address and password. 

WE LOVE FEEDBACK 
Email your feedback, suggestions, and questions to service@jossandmain.com. We can't reply directly to App Store reviews, so send us a quick email if there’s anything we can do for you.
trackCensoredName: Joss & Main – Furniture, home decor & more
trackName: Joss & Main – Furniture, home decor & more
releaseNotes:
A fresh coat of paint, swapping out a rug, switching up the artwork… At Joss & Main, we know there’s nothing like the perfect update. Recently, we redesigned a few features to make our app even better. Here’s the latest:
 
· Better access to more of your favorite sales! We are pleased to now support even more of our website catalog's products for purchase through the App.
· Smoother, more seamless shopping. We’ve done some maintenance to improve speed, style, and dependability.  
 
Love the Joss & Main app? Please share your thoughts in an App Store review. Happy shopping!
